ValidationRule.description: [EBH] (EPH-4170) - Deal Status Accepted. EPH-7391 --- THIS VR MUST BE ACTIVE --
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(EBH_Status__c, "New"), ISPICKVAL(EBH_Status__c, "Rejected"), ISPICKVAL(EBH_Status__c, "Negotiating"), ISPICKVAL( EBH_Status__c, "Negotiating Amended"), ISPICKVAL(EBH_DealSiteId__c,"15"))), OR( AND( OR( LEFT(OwnerId, 3) = "00G", ISNULL(EBH_DealPrice__c), TEXT(EBH_DealFormat__c) = "", ISBLANK(EBH_DealStartDate__c), ISBLANK(EBH_DealStartTime__c), ISBLANK(EBH_DealEndDate__c), ISBLANK(EBH_DealEndTime__c), ISBLANK(EBH_SellerEmail__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(EBH_DealFormat__c))), $Profile.Name <> 'DE - Seller Portal'), AND( ISPICKVAL(EBH_DealFormat__c, "Featured"), ISBLANK( EBH_SpotlightCategory__c)), AND( NOT( ISBLANK(EBH_eBayItemID__c)), OR( LEN(EBH_eBayItemID__c) < 9, LEN(EBH_eBayItemID__c) > 16 , NOT( ISNUMBER(EBH_eBayItemID__c)))), (EBH_DealEndDate__c < EBH_DealStartDate__c), (EBH_SellerPrice__c < EBH_DealPrice__c ), AND( !Invalid_VAT_ID__c , EBH_Subsidy__c > 0, ISPICKVAL(EBH_Status__c, "Planned")) ), RecordType.DeveloperName ='Deal_V1')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter and validate all required information before the deal can be moved to Planned (Deal Price, Start/End Date/Time, Seller Email, Spotlight category for featured deals, eBay Item ID, valid VAT/ABN ID for deals with subsidy).
